caseTitle: Mubarik Ali Babar v. Punjab Public Service Commission thr. its Secretary, Lahore & others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Constitutional justification for quota for minorities and persons with disabilities (PWDs) - The Constitution not only caters to PWDs, being a depressed and backward class, and guarantees that both PWDs and minorities are equal citizens of Pakistan, having equal rights and safeguards, it also provides them with extra care and protection.
